metadata.title: Geyoga 2 Pieces Christmas Hat, Black and White Adults Santa Hat, Xmas Holiday Hat for Black Christmas Theme New Year Festive Holiday Party Supplies
features: Black and white Santa hat: our Christmas hats are designed with black and white color, which are different from the traditional red and white Christmas hats; If you want to have a more special Christmas hat on Christmas, I recommend you to choose it

Soft and comfortable material: the Santa hat is made of black plush fabric trimmed with white faux fur and pom; Black velvet fabric and double comfortable liner make adult Santa hats soft and good touch feeling; Soft comfortable fabric to provide protection to your head and hair without irritation or sweat, hand washable, anti-sensitive, you and your family will love it

Larger size: the black and white Christmas hats is approximately 31.5 inch tall with 3.15 inch pom pom, approximately 24 inch in circumference around inside of hat, fit most people's head, can be great for the whole family

Nice Christmas gift: the Christmas hat is great for most adult, women and men, great gifts for friends and families; The Santa hat brings a nice atmosphere in the Christmas, the child's interesting gift

Good Christmas party decorations: nice decoration prop headwear for party costume to create a pleasant and interesting atmosphere; Great costume accessories for Christmas, Halloween, Xmas cosplay, party, birthday, New Year, or even for giggles, annual ceremony, community activities, stage performance, holiday party, etc.
description: Specification: Material: black plush fabric Color: black and white Size: 31.5 inch in height, 24 inch in circumference  Package includes: 2 x Santa hat  Note: Manual measurement, please allow slight errors on size.
